works.description: We have seen a range of automobile themed furniture in the past, and the latest we have is the Bugatti inspired Executive Desk from Luzzo Bespoke. The bespoke desk takes styling cues from the Bugatti Grand Prix racing cars of the late ‘20s and early ‘30s. Details taken from the design of the cars were used in different forms or scales within the design. The drive gears for the height adjustment are a scaled-up version of the Winfield carburetor synchronization quadrants from a Type 57, and the drawer fronts reflect the honeycombed grill.
